alfredsnippet.snippet:
(gdp
 .drop('country_code',1)
 .query(""" year == 2017 """)
 .set_index('country_name')['value']
 .nlargest(10)
 .sort_values()
 .div(1e12)
 .plot
 .barh(color=sns.color_palette('husl',10),figsize=(12,8),
       title='Top 10 GDP countries for year 2017')
)

plt.xlabel('GDP (Trillion$)')
plt.ylabel('Country')
alfredsnippet.name: viz gdp country vs gdp
